channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tempted by the IKEA donut lamp? The upgraded Philips Hue Flourish might be an even better smart home buy
item.description: In the market for a new smart lamp for your table? Philips Hue is updating one of its models.

item.title: YouTube Music just got a big queue upgrade that users have wanted for years – and now Apple Music fans are demanding the same
item.description: YouTube Music users can now pick up where they left off across Android and iOS devices, but Apple Music has yet to do the same.

item.title: Good leaders don’t shut down when employees push back—they do this instead
item.description: Your resistance problem is actually an intelligence problem. Twenty years ago, as the top digital and innovation executive for Citi’s credit card business, I led the team that spent months building what looked like a brilliant partnership. We’d found a startup with a disruptive payments platform—one that became the forerunner of what has become a new payment type used by millions of consumers today. The deal: strategic investment in exchange for access to the startup’s codebase as a sandbox for innovation pilots. No more waiting in the legacy systems queue. Just rapid prototyping with leading-...

item.title: Les prix des SSD NVMe explosent, mais ce Samsung 4 To avec dissipateur reste à un prix normal pour le moment
item.description: Avec la hausse des prix du stockage, certaines offres méritent qu’on s’y attarde. Le SSD NVMe Samsung 990 Pro, dans sa version 4 To avec dissipateur thermique intégré, est actuellement affiché à 369 euros. Un tarif correct pour un modèle haut de gamme qui devient une bonne affaire à saisir avant une éventuelle remontée des prix.

item.title: Superéthanol-E85 : E.Leclerc veut démocratiser la conversion avec une offre à prix cassé
item.description: E.Leclerc dévoile ce 26 janvier une offre de conversion au Superéthanol-E85 dans ses centres auto. Avec un tarif compétitif et une installation rapide, l'enseigne promet plus de 700 euros d'économies par an.

item.title: 1Password à une solution simple pour se protéger des faux sites
item.description: Le gestionnaire de mot de passe a trouvé une solution simple pour aider ses utilisateurs à ne pas se faire avoir par une stratégie basique des arnaques en ligne.

item.title: Microsoft’s first Windows 11 update of 2026 has been a mess
item.description: Microsoft's first update for Windows 11 in 2026 has been a buggy mess, to say the least. After reports of shutdown issues on some machines, Microsoft issued an emergency update to fix its January 2026 Windows 11 update last weekend. Now, exactly a week later, the software maker has been forced to issue a second […]

item.title: Scandale sur Windows : Microsoft a permis au FBI de déverrouiller des PC chiffrés avec BitLocker
item.description: BitLocker a un talon d’Achille, et c'est Microsoft. L'éditeur a accepté de remettre au FBI des clés de récupération stockées dans son cloud. Avec ces clés, les agents fédéraux ont pu déchiffrer les données de trois ordinateurs. Cette affaire montre que Microsoft est en mesure de communiquer vos clés si la justice le demande.

item.title: Microsoft admits Windows 11 update is nuking system drives, albeit there's a 'limited number of reports' of these disasters
item.description: Windows 11 runs into another disastrous bug with its latest update — Microsoft admits an 'issue in which devices are failing to boot', worryingly.

item.title: We Strapped on Exoskeletons and Raced. There’s One Clear Winner
item.description: WIRED put the latest consumer exoskeletons from Dnsys and Hypershell in a head-to-head test on a pro athletic track. On your marks …

item.title: What is ‘situational retirement’—and should you give it a try?
item.description: Whether not quite fully retired or merely under-employed, this is how to live while waiting for the phone to ring. As an operative researcher for luxury retail companies, I spent my career grabbing onto one corporate contract after the next, like a tree-swinging retainer monkey. But in a tariff-distressed industry, those contract “branches” grew further and further apart until I was left hanging. Then a colleague experiencing a similar work gap said, “Well, I guess we’re retired.”...

item.title: Davos reveals mixed messages on CEO confidence—and new narratives on AI
item.description: ‘Modern CEO’ goes to the World Economic Forum Annual Meeting in Davos. Here’s what leaders here are saying. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: Strava's finally given Apple Watch users a WorkOutdoors-style feature they've been missing in the Workout app for years
item.description: Strava users on Apple Watch can now follow pre-generated routes while recording a workout, just like the native Garmin feature.

item.title: Of all the new 2026 robot lawn mowers, these are the 3 I'm most excited to try out
item.description: There are plenty of excellent lawbots heading our way in 2026, but these 3 stand out from the crowd.

item.title: Les plateformes SVoD préférées des français : Apple TV crée la surprise et détrône un Canal+ en chute libre
item.description: Spécialiste de l'actualité ciné/série et du marché de la VoD, le site JustWatch vient de dévoiler son dernier rapport sur les parts de marché en France. Bien que le classement reste quasiment immobile, on pourrait assister à une redistribution des cartes avec quelques surprises.

item.title: Le milliardaire tchèque David Kretinsky veut prendre le contrôle de Fnac Darty
item.description: Du mouvement à venir chez Fnac Darty ? Le milliardaire tchèque veut devenir actionnaire majoritaire de l'enseigne culturelle la plus connue des Français.

item.title: Make stealing time a crime: How to protect your most valuable resource
item.description: Time has become the ultimate luxury. Here’s how to guard it. I’m always amazed at how easily we give our time to others without thinking, and then are mad later when it was wasted. What exactly did we think was going to happen? That everyone was going to be prepared, productive, and appreciative?

item.title: In defence of awful laptops: how trash hardware can actually improve your life
item.description: The memory sucks, the Wi-Fi drops, it’s ridiculously uncomfortable — and I’ve never been more productive.

item.title: A big British audio brand just launched Bluetooth speakers that give off major JBL vibes — but for way cheaper
item.description: Majority launches four new portable speakers with rugged good looks

item.title: Most workplace AI projects are stuck at the concept stage - so what can be done to improve this?
item.description: Many companies are struggling to shift from early pilot stages to successful ROI when it comes to agentic AI.

item.title: Les soldes frappent Intersport et ce vélo électrique E-Gravel avec 100 km d’autonomie et une réduction de 400 €
item.description: Le Nakamura E-Gravel est un VAE à usage polyvalent pour faciliter tous vos déplacements, à retrouver pour 1699,99 euros au lieu de 2099,99 euros sur Intersport.

item.title: The Blink Mini 2 plummets to an even lower price than Black Friday
item.description: The Blink Mini 2 is now even cheaper than Black Friday thanks to a 53% discount at Amazon

item.title: Google Photos pourrait ressembler à TikTok avec cet ajout
item.description: Google a une solution pour vous faire scroller dans vos souvenirs en utilisant Google Gemini.

item.title: Amazon multiplie les offres à l’approche de la dernière démarque : les 17 meilleurs deals à saisir
item.description: On attaque une nouvelle semaine de soldes d’hiver et, à quelques jours de la dernière démarque, Amazon met les bouchées doubles avec des offres très attractives sur de nombreux produits tech, notamment des smartphones pliants, des vidéoprojecteurs à prix cassé.

item.title: Researchers say Russian government hackers were behind attempted Poland power outage
item.description: ESET says Sandworm used a piece of malware called DynoWiper to carry out attack on Polish systems.

item.title: Gemini Live sur Android règle enfin le plus gros défaut de son interface
item.description: La version Android de Gemini Live va devenir bien plus simple à utiliser grâce à un nouveau bouton d'action flottant.

item.title: Cette technologie issue de SpaceX pourrait sauver les data centers de la surchauffe (et sans une goutte d’eau)
item.description: La start-up américaine Karman Industries travaille sur une nouvelle technologie de refroidissement pour les data centers, nécessitant beaucoup moins d'espace, d'électricité et, surtout, aucune eau.

item.title: ARM pour un gamer ? Lenovo préparerait une pluie de modèles sous Nvidia N1
item.description: Lenovo a laissé filer les références de 7 nouveaux modèles de PC portables, dont un nouveau gamer Legion 7, équipés de puces Nvidia N1 et N1X. Une solution ARM attendue de longue date, et dont la commercialisation interviendrait dans le courant d'année 2026.

item.title: People Are Protesting Data Centers—but Embracing the Factories That Supply Them
item.description: As the data center backlash grows, support is growing for server factories and the hundreds of jobs they’re expected to bring.

item.title: The decline of Food52, Goop, Hodinkee—and the internet’s dream of content-to-commerce
item.description: Content-driven commerce, once billed as the digital salvation for both publishing and retail, is no longer a viable business for either industry. Remember how much fun it was to shop on the internet a decade ago?

item.title: A play with no actors on stage? That’s the bet behind the world’s first play in mixed reality
item.description: ‘An Ark’ stars an ever-so-shrewd Ian McKellen, who isn’t really there. When a stranger smiles at you, you smile back. That is why, when Sir Ian McKellen (The Lord of the Rings, X-Men, Amadeus) walked on the stage in front of me, looked me straight in the eye, and smiled at me, I smiled back. It was the polite thing to do. It was also completely unnecessary, because McKellen was not actually on the stage in front of me. He smiled at me through a pair of special glasses....

item.title: Quitting your job might not solve your burnout. Here’s why
item.description: Before handing in your resignation notice, pay attention to the way you work. A lot of people chase bigger paychecks and fancier titles, convinced that their next role will finally make them happy. I know I did.

item.title: These clever anti-ICE signs are taking over Minneapolis
item.description: Meet Burlesque, the local design team behind the municipal iconography-riffing signage popping up on yard signs in and storefront windows. Federal immigration agents stationed in Minneapolis need not read polls or confront protesters to know how the city feels about their presence. Walking around just about any neighborhood in the area lately should provide a glimpse into the vast sprawl of graffiti and homemade yard signs expressing residents’ bone-deep aversion to ICE. One poster in particular, though, has been increasingly decorating the storefront windows of local restaurants, coffee shop...

item.title: How Apple’s late AI adoption could transform from a weakness to a strength
item.description: Apple’s road to putting AI magic in its products has been a bruising one, but the company has precendent for turning being late into a strategic advantange. Apple will turn its Siri assistant into a full-fledged chatbot by next year. The company is working on a personal AI device to compete with the one OpenAI is building with Jony Ive. And Apple is putting control over its AI strategy into new hands within the company. So say a flurry of new reports, all advancing the larger story that Apple is doing what it can to get itself back in the AI race. ...

item.title: Une question de négociation, pourquoi Forza Horizon 6 n’aura pas de version française
item.description: Le jeu Forza Horizon 6 a eu droit à une présentation très complète. Elle cachait une mauvaise nouvelle pour les joueurs français : l'absence de VF pour le jeu, une première dans la série.
